function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of diseases through air vents and plumbing systems in housing complexes.","Impact":"Risk of disease spread within the community.","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of plumbing systems, implementation of air purification systems, and adoption of antimicrobial materials.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, antimicrobial coatings, and smart sensor technology for monitoring wastewater.","People":"Residents of housing complexes, building maintenance staff, public health authorities.","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater, indicating potential presence of the virus.","Impact":"Risk of environmental contamination and public health implications.","Mitigation":"Implementation of wastewater monitoring and surveillance systems, development of rapid testing methods for wastewater, and public health education on environmental risks.","Technologies":"Wastewater testing and monitoring technology, rapid testing kits, and public health communication tools.","People":"Public health authorities, environmental agencies, wastewater treatment facilities.","Owner":"Public health authorities, environmental agencies."},{"Description":"Genetic similarity of SARS-CoV-2 to SARS-CoV, and potential for faecal-oral transmission.","Impact":"Risk of faecal-oral transmission of the virus and public health implications.","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation and hygiene practices, public education on faecal-oral transmission risks, and development of targeted intervention strategies.","Technologies":"Sanitation and hygiene equipment, public health communication tools, and targeted intervention programs.","People":"General public, public health authorities, sanitation workers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, sanitation agencies."}]}
